metadata.title: CVE-2017-15105 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
A flaw was found in the way unbound before 1.6.8 validatedwildcard-synthesized NSEC records. An improperly validated wildcard NSECrecord could be used to prove the non-existence (NXDOMAIN answer) of anexisting wildcard record, or trick unbound into accepting a NODATA proof.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-15105` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libunbound2 - 1.5.8-1ubuntu1.1
python-unbound - 1.5.8-1ubuntu1.1
unbound - 1.5.8-1ubuntu1.1
unbound-anchor - 1.5.8-1ubuntu1.1
unbound-host - 1.5.8-1ubuntu1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: unbound package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.5.8-1ubuntu1.1').
